title: Economic Emergency Debate, Military Activity Alerts, and Market Shifts Shape National Dialogue
subtitle: Report automatically generated on 2026-01-17 by the Trade Section, EU Delegation to Colombia
summary: Several key political and economic developments have emerged, including a growing debate among governors regarding the government's economic emergency decree, with at least 17 departments questioning its legal viability [[REF:3085fec1-e1cc-4a5e-a328-388424b9582f]]. Concurrently, concerns over national security have been amplified by alerts regarding "military activity" in Colombian airspace, prompting airlines to activate protocols, though air navigation has not been directly affected [[REF:00992677-adb2-4f8e-b75a-d618828c84b5], [[REF:16c2f10e-a6bf-42a9-9b46-a53edd7337af]]. Economically, the financial sector demonstrated resilience with a notable profit increase by November [[REF:1cef9b15-c8ac-440e-9f7a-e22bd2df317f]], while small businesses face pressure from rising labor costs [[REF:f8255cae-62af-4a1c-b331-81660086b681]]. The impending elimination of tariffs on U.S. powdered milk also raises concerns for domestic producers [[REF:d06a1816-e441-44b6-9a1a-3b4a395b8b3e]].

sections.title: Political and Governance Developments
sections.body: A significant political debate is underway concerning President Gustavo Petro's economic emergency decree, with governors from at least 17 departments voicing opposition and questioning its legal viability [[REF:3085fec1-e1cc-4a5e-a328-388424b9582f], [[REF:2e4b24c7-99dc-418c-8f49-12f0d64964a5]]. This "rebellion" highlights concerns over territorial autonomy and the decree's potential impact on departmental finances [[REF:f70d8c9b-5d59-4d4d-98ce-76e02ae513cc]]. The political landscape is further complicated by former President Álvaro Uribe's criticism of President Petro's upcoming meeting with Donald Trump, labeling Petro and Cepeda as "allies of Maduro" [[REF:a747a95d-a6cb-4480-96e4-ec5017394923]]. In other governance news, the Prosecutor's Office has launched an investigation into a multi-million peso contract awarded by the Presidency to a firm advising President Petro in the U.S. [[REF:6512240e-fa2f-4d3e-9c99-8a62c94f2b17]]. Meanwhile, the Senate President, Lidio García, expressed concerns that proposed budget cuts to Congress could jeopardize its functioning [[REF:97ffdaa5-676d-4166-b2fa-7ac00f5fd58b]]. The ELN's continued attacks, including a drone strike resulting in soldier fatalities in Catatumbo, underscore ongoing security challenges [[REF:bcc8e8b1-58c6-4385-8bbd-055db9289c6c], [[REF:16cf9ee3-4463-4fa7-be40-ca30b9041b8d]]. The expansion of illegal armed groups also poses a risk to upcoming elections [[REF:4650644c-291e-4b6d-9f4e-c325ffaea661]]. The UNP dismissed a contractor amid sexual harassment allegations, prompting an institutional review [[REF:9f7e70dd-aeb6-4100-bebe-33e4b4fcf97a]].

sections.title: Economic and Financial Sector Updates
sections.body: The Colombian financial sector demonstrated robust performance by November 2025, with total profits reaching BCOP 122.08 trillion, an 8.06% increase from the previous year [[REF:1cef9b15-c8ac-440e-9f7a-e22bd2df317f]]. Bancolombia, Banco Davivienda, and Banco de Bogotá emerged as the top-performing banks in terms of profitability [[REF:b6185a0e-bd9d-4d18-b1ec-a92d4e9eda00]]. However, small businesses are facing significant pressure at the start of 2026 due to a 23% increase in the minimum wage and rising surcharges [[REF:f8255cae-62af-4a1c-b331-81660086b681]]. A legal challenge has been filed against the government's decree to increase the minimum wage by 23%, alleging that legal criteria were not followed [[REF:81747f0c-160a-424c-9754-6aea833ae5a4]]. In trade policy, the elimination of tariffs on U.S. powdered milk, as stipulated by the Free Trade Agreement, is set to reach 0% by 2026, raising concerns for domestic producers [[REF:d06a1816-e441-44b6-9a1a-3b4a395b8b3e]]. The Ministry of Transport is updating the SICE-TAC system with new cost variables, including minimum wage and fuel prices, to better reflect freight transport expenses [[REF:9d141977-753d-4a56-98eb-913152669576], [[REF:6d39915d-4082-4820-a078-5e00434f37e1]]. Certificates of Deposit (CDTs) are experiencing significant growth in popularity and investment volume among Colombians [[REF:006b4a51-797a-4d7f-87f0-ccdab6ce38b1], [[REF:b6f68dd2-bfd7-46da-ac46-ea646e8b92b1]]. The government plans to raise approximately $2.5 trillion through increased VAT on tobacco and spirits, a move opposed by 20 out of 32 governors [[REF:d386132a-0302-449e-95fd-c1bb4f2a2089]]. A significant investment of over US$1.7 billion is planned for electrical works in the Caribbean region to strengthen infrastructure and integrate renewable energy sources [[REF:ca6a53d3-cd16-4ac4-8076-50dd9d0e4c55], [[REF:3e93aaea-5c52-43c3-9053-72fe05204231]].

sections.title: Security and Armed Conflict
sections.body: The Catatumbo region continues to grapple with a prolonged humanitarian crisis, marked by a year of intense confrontations between the ELN and dissident Farc groups, resulting in significant casualties and displacement [[REF:d37a741c-5b47-4d71-8ec0-0b8782c5baf0], [[REF:5160f773-e285-45c5-9558-0276ab0ea8ba]]. An ELN drone attack in Tibú claimed the life of one soldier and injured four others, highlighting the ongoing threat in the Catatumbo region [[REF:bcc8e8b1-58c6-4385-8bbd-055db9289c6c], [[REF:16cf9ee3-4463-4fa7-be40-ca30b9041b8d]]. President Petro condemned the ELN's actions, drawing attention to the deaths of young Colombians and Venezuelans at the hands of the group [[REF:0b73cfcf-9b48-4b02-83c8-ff2bfd85af55]]. The expansion of illegal armed groups poses a significant risk to the upcoming elections [[REF:4650644c-291e-4b6d-9f4e-c325ffaea661]]. Furthermore, U.S. warnings about "military activity" in Colombian airspace have led airlines to activate protocols, although no immediate impact on air navigation has been reported [[REF:00992677-adb2-4f8e-b75a-d618828c84b5], [[REF:16c2f10e-a6bf-42a9-9b46-a53edd7337af]]. The FAA has issued a specific safety alert for the Colombian Pacific region due to potential risks from military activities and GNSS interference [[REF:16c2f10e-a6bf-42a9-9b46-a53edd7337af]]. The Army reported an incident where troops were surrounded by civilians during an operation in Nariño, which was resolved through dialogue [[REF:35e4b924-00b8-4368-957a-18d718adbce8]]. Concerns have also been raised about the use of the National Army's budget in Catatumbo for non-essential items amidst the ongoing crisis [[REF:d7999368-0fb3-4f47-85bf-8581f5dce97e]].

sections.title: Sector-Specific Developments
sections.body: In the healthcare sector, the National Superintendency of Health has extended a precautionary measure against Fomag due to persistent care failures, requiring an updated work plan [[REF:01ba4f0b-b639-47ae-8ebc-1ffad19303b7]]. Similarly, the Attorney General's Office has alerted Nueva EPS about issues with its contingency plan for drug delivery [[REF:0ce4f846-33b6-4e6c-b462-cc51fd046a88]]. Nueva EPS has applied for over $1.5 trillion to pay healthcare providers in January 2026 [[REF:cabb31c9-a449-461c-ac59-a06b5635db98]]. The State Council has ruled that EPS can use UPC funds to pay old debts under specific conditions [[REF:d1037559-954e-47ea-80fc-58f44826211f]]. In the transportation sector, toll rates have increased across 80 major roads, with some exceeding inflation rates [[REF:aa0fbbb6-01e9-40e4-80f9-d6baae248bcb]]. The Coffee Axis tolls remain in place due to a binding arbitration ruling, despite President Petro's intention to dismantle them [[REF:8d0e6467-c7a1-4e60-8638-116eade2982a]]. The Ministry of Transport is updating the SICE-TAC system with new cost variables for cargo transport [[REF:9d141977-753d-4a56-98eb-913152669576]]. In sports, Colombian football clubs are offering season tickets at prices up to $1.8 million as a financial strategy amid league challenges [[REF:205c31e0-b339-4781-85fc-e4df7b79d256]]. The construction guild warns of legal and access risks associated with a decree aiming to de-index affordable housing [[REF:f41c87b5-1734-4272-9d43-d5852085322d]].
